item.title: Unauthorization of Oauth Token Leads to Pre Account Takeover without Verifying üçÇ
item.description: Summary # On Fitbit official website I was able to register with any account without verifying the email because of the vulnerability Broken Authentication. This was due to the unauthorization of the Oauth token with respect to the email address which was being transferred to the server. Functionalities # On fitbit.com there are 2 functionalities to register in the account. One is normal functionality of email address and password whereas other is the functionality of Oauth by which you can register using your google account.
